class.name: VisualShaderNode
class.brief_description: Base class for nodes in a visual shader graph.
class.description: Visual shader graphs consist of various nodes. Each node in the graph is a separate object and they are represented as a rectangular boxes with title and a set of properties. Each node has also connection ports that allow to connect it to another nodes and control the flow of the shader.

method.name: get_default_input_values
method.description: Returns an [Array] containing default values for all of the input ports of the node in the form [code][index0, value0, index1, value1, ...][/code].

method.name: get_input_port_default_value
method.description: Returns the default value of the input [code]port[/code].

method.name: set_default_input_values
method.description: Sets the default input ports values using an [Array] of the form [code][index0, value0, index1, value1, ...][/code]. For example: [code][0, Vector3(0, 0, 0), 1, Vector3(0, 0, 0)][/code].

method.name: set_input_port_default_value
method.description: Sets the default value for the selected input [code]port[/code].

members.member: Sets the output port index which will be showed for preview. If set to [code]-1[/code] no port will be open for preview.

signal.name: editor_refresh_request
signal.description: Emitted when the node requests an editor refresh. Currently called only in setter of [member VisualShaderNodeTexture.source], [VisualShaderNodeTexture], and [VisualShaderNodeCubeMap] (and their derivatives).
